verses.kjv: And I stood upon the sand of the sea, and saw a beast rise up out of the sea, having seven heads and ten horns, and upon his horns ten crowns, and upon his heads the name of blasphemy.
verses.web: Then I stood on the sand of the sea. I saw a beast coming up out of the sea, having ten horns and seven heads. On his horns were ten crowns, and on his heads, blasphemous names.
verses.ct: Then I stood on the shore of the sea and watched a beast rise up out of the water. It had 7 heads and 10 horns, with a crown on each horn, and blasphemous names written on each of its heads.

verses.kjv: And the beast which I saw was like unto a leopard, and his feet were as the feet of a bear, and his mouth as the mouth of a lion: and the dragon gave him his power, and his seat, and great authority.
verses.web: The beast which I saw was like a leopard, and his feet were like those of a bear, and his mouth like the mouth of a lion. The dragon gave him his power, his throne, and great authority.
verses.ct: The beast looked like a leopard, but it had the feet of a bear and the mouth of a lion. The dragon gave this beast his own power, his throne, and tremendous authority.

verses.kjv: And I saw one of his heads as it were wounded to death; and his deadly wound was healed: and all the world wondered after the beast.
verses.web: One of his heads looked like it had been wounded fatally. His fatal wound was healed, and the whole earth marveled at the beast.
verses.ct: One of the beast's heads appeared to have suffered a fatal wound, but the wound had been healed. The whole earth was amazed and followed after the beast.

verses.kjv: And they worshipped the dragon which gave power unto the beast: and they worshipped the beast, saying, Who is like unto the beast? who is able to make war with him?
verses.web: They worshiped the dragon, because he gave his authority to the beast, and they worshiped the beast, saying, “Who is like the beast? Who is able to make war with him?”
verses.ct: People worshiped the dragon because he had given his authority to the beast. They also worshiped the beast, saying, "Who can compare to the beast? Who could possibly fight against him?"

verses.kjv: And there was given unto him a mouth speaking great things and blasphemies; and power was given unto him to continue forty and two months.
verses.web: A mouth speaking great things and blasphemy was given to him. Authority to make war for forty-two months was given to him.
verses.ct: The beast was given a mouth to speak arrogant words and blasphemies, and he was given authority to act for 42 months.

verses.kjv: And he opened his mouth in blasphemy against God, to blaspheme his name, and his tabernacle, and them that dwell in heaven.
verses.web: He opened his mouth for blasphemy against God, to blaspheme his name, and his dwelling, those who dwell in heaven.
verses.ct: He opened his mouth to hurl blasphemies against God — insulting his name, his dwelling place, and everyone who lives in heaven.

verses.kjv: And it was given unto him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them: and power was given him over all kindreds, and tongues, and nations.
verses.web: It was given to him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them. Authority over every tribe, people, language, and nation was given to him.
verses.ct: He was allowed to wage war against God's holy people and to defeat them. He was also given authority over every tribe, people, language, and nation.

verses.kjv: And all that dwell upon the earth shall worship him, whose names are not written in the book of life of the Lamb slain from the foundation of the world.
verses.web: All who dwell on the earth will worship him, everyone whose name has not been written from the foundation of the world in the book of life of the Lamb who has been killed.
verses.ct: Everyone living on earth will worship him — everyone whose name has not been written in the book of life belonging to the Lamb who was slain from the foundation of the world.

verses.kjv: If any man have an ear, let him hear.
verses.web: If anyone has an ear, let him hear.
verses.ct: If anyone has ears to hear, let him listen carefully.

verses.kjv: He that leadeth into captivity shall go into captivity: he that killeth with the sword must be killed with the sword. Here is the patience and the faith of the saints.
verses.web: If anyone is to go into captivity, he will go into captivity. If anyone is to be killed with the sword, he must be killed. Here is the endurance and the faith of the saints.
verses.ct: Anyone destined for captivity will go into captivity. Anyone destined to die by the sword will die by the sword. This is where the endurance and faith of God's holy people will be tested.

verses.kjv: And I beheld another beast coming up out of the earth; and he had two horns like a lamb, and he spake as a dragon.
verses.web: I saw another beast coming up out of the earth. He had two horns like a lamb, and he spoke like a dragon.
verses.ct: Then I saw another beast rising up out of the earth. He had 2 horns like a lamb, but he spoke like a dragon.

verses.kjv: And he exerciseth all the power of the first beast before him, and causeth the earth and them which dwell therein to worship the first beast, whose deadly wound was healed.
verses.web: He exercises all the authority of the first beast in his presence. He makes the earth and those who dwell in it to worship the first beast, whose fatal wound was healed.
verses.ct: He wielded all the authority of the first beast on his behalf and forced the earth and everyone on it to worship the first beast — the one whose fatal wound had been healed.

verses.kjv: And he doeth great wonders, so that he maketh fire come down from heaven on the earth in the sight of men,
verses.web: He performs great signs, even making fire come down out of the sky to the earth in the sight of people.
verses.ct: He performed spectacular signs, even calling fire down from heaven to the earth while people watched.

verses.kjv: And deceiveth them that dwell on the earth by the means of those miracles which he had power to do in the sight of the beast; saying to them that dwell on the earth, that they should make an image to the beast, which had the wound by a sword, and did live.
verses.web: He deceives my own people who dwell on the earth because of the signs he was granted to do in front of the beast, saying to those who dwell on the earth that they should make an image to the beast who had the sword wound and lived.
verses.ct: He deceived the people living on earth through the signs he was allowed to perform on behalf of the first beast. He told them to build an image honoring the beast who had been wounded by the sword and yet survived.

verses.kjv: And he had power to give life unto the image of the beast, that the image of the beast should both speak, and cause that as many as would not worship the image of the beast should be killed.
verses.web: It was given to him to give breath to it, to the image of the beast, that the image of the beast should both speak, and cause as many as wouldn’t worship the image of the beast to be killed.
verses.ct: He was given the power to breathe life into the image of the beast so that it could actually speak. The image then ordered that anyone who refused to worship it be killed.

verses.kjv: And he causeth all, both small and great, rich and poor, free and bond, to receive a mark in their right hand, or in their foreheads:
verses.web: He causes all, the small and the great, the rich and the poor, and the free and the slave, to be given marks on their right hands, or on their foreheads;
verses.ct: He forced everyone — small and great, rich and poor, free and slave — to receive a mark on their right hand or on their forehead.

verses.kjv: And that no man might buy or sell, save he that had the mark, or the name of the beast, or the number of his name.
verses.web: and that no one would be able to buy or to sell, unless he has that mark, which is the name of the beast or the number of his name.
verses.ct: No one could buy or sell anything unless they had the mark, which was either the name of the beast or the number of his name.

verses.kjv: Here is wisdom. Let him that hath understanding count the number of the beast: for it is the number of a man; and his number is Six hundred threescore and six.
verses.web: Here is wisdom. He who has understanding, let him calculate the number of the beast, for it is the number of a man. His number is six hundred sixty-six.
verses.ct: This calls for wisdom. Let anyone with understanding calculate the number of the beast, because it is the number of a man. His number is 666.
